effect_entries.effect: May be traded to the Copycat for a []{item:pass}.
effect_entries.short_effect: A Poké Doll lost by the Copycat who lives in Saffron City. Trade for a Pass.

flavor_text_entries.text:
モノマネ娘が　なくした
マネネの　人形。

The Mime Jr. doll that was lost by
the Copycat.

Poké Bambola raffigurante Mime Jr. smarrita
da Copiona.

Poké Ball algo distinta que atrapa con más
facilidad los Pokémon que evolucionan con la
Piedra Lunar.

Eine Pantimimi-Puppe, welche die Nachahmerin
verloren hat.
La Poupée Mime Jr. perdue par la Copieuse.

モノマネむすめが　なくした
マネネの　にんぎょう。

The Mime Jr. doll that was lost by
the Copycat.

The Mime Jr. doll that was lost by
the Copycat.
Poupée Mime Jr. perdue par la Copieuse.
The Poké Doll lost by the Copycat.
